name: Domes from Mars
description:
Your mission is to collect all the Martian spice to reactivate the weakened Martian magnetic field and prevent it from colliding with the earth.

The game is currently in development, you can play a couple of levels, it also has many bugs, I hope you know how to forgive it.

More project information: behance.net/Domes-form-Mars

I am interested in your opinion, is it very easy? Or very difficult?

Thanks for playing!
